name: ovo (Cirr)
description:
Grow eggs to spec, organ by organ, in an alien world with alien tools, with a custom incubator sac and questionable workplace documentation.

This is a Jam entry for Grow-ON Jam, and it's a little strange. General motivation and inspiration was the feeling of being lost in strange options and text-less worlds (and a bit of nostalgia for similar sensations from ancient DOS games), so if things feel confusing and abstract, that was kind of the goal.

Hopefully there'll be updates in future to add things like sound, a few more quality of life features there weren't time for, and a lot more, well, life added to things.
